result.title: How to propose a (single) problem to be used in future contests?
result.content: I have an idea for a very neat problem envolving trees and mathematics. Althought it´s not trivial, math-minded folks will likely solve it in no more than a few minutes. So i´d like to know where can i propose only this problem, so that it is avaible to be used in future contests if it interests anyone.
